text: MISTER QUILTER IS THE APOSTLE OF THE MIDDLE CLASSES AND WE ARE GLAD TO WELCOME HIS GOSPEL
reference: mister quilter is the apostle of the middle classes and we are glad to welcome his gospel

text: NOR IS MISTER QUILTER'S MANNER LESS INTERESTING THAN HIS MATTER
reference: nor is mister quilter's manner less interesting than his matter

text: HE TELLS US THAT AT THIS FESTIVE SEASON OF THE YEAR WITH CHRISTMAS AND ROAST BEEF LOOMING BEFORE US SIMILES DRAWN FROM EATING AND ITS RESULTS OCCUR MOST READILY TO THE MIND
reference: he tells us that at this festive season of the year with christmas and roast beef looming before us similes drawn from eating and its results occur most readily to the mind

text: HE HAS GRAVE DOUBTS WHETHER SIR FREDERICK LEIGHTON'S WORK IS REALLY GREEK AFTER ALL AND CAN DISCOVER IN IT BUT LITTLE OF ROCKY ITHACA
reference: he has grave doubts whether sir frederick leighton's work is really greek after all and can discover in it but little of rocky ithaca

text: LINNELL'S PICTURES ARE A SORT OF UP GUARDS AND AT EM PAINTINGS AND MASON'S EXQUISITE IDYLLS ARE AS NATIONAL AS A JINGO POEM MISTER BIRKET FOSTER'S LANDSCAPES SMILE AT ONE MUCH IN THE SAME WAY THAT MISTER CARKER USED TO FLASH HIS TEETH AND MISTER JOHN COLLIER GIVES HIS SITTER A CHEERFUL SLAP ON THE BACK BEFORE HE SAYS LIKE A SHAMPOOER IN A TURKISH BATH NEXT MAN
reference: linnell's pictures are a sort of up guards and at em paintings and mason's exquisite idylls are as national as a jingo poem mister birket foster's landscapes smile at one much in the same way that mister carker used to flash his teeth and mister john collier gives his sitter a cheerful slap on the back before he says like a shampooer in a turkish bath next man

text: IT IS OBVIOUSLY UNNECESSARY FOR US TO POINT OUT HOW LUMINOUS THESE CRITICISMS ARE HOW DELICATE IN EXPRESSION
reference: it is obviously unnecessary for us to point out how luminous these criticisms are how delicate in expression

text: ON THE GENERAL PRINCIPLES OF ART MISTER QUILTER WRITES WITH EQUAL LUCIDITY
reference: on the general principles of art mister quilter writes with equal lucidity

text: PAINTING HE TELLS US IS OF A DIFFERENT QUALITY TO MATHEMATICS AND FINISH IN ART IS ADDING MORE FACT
reference: painting he tells us is of a different quality to mathematics and finish in art is adding more fact

text: AS FOR ETCHINGS THEY ARE OF TWO KINDS BRITISH AND FOREIGN
reference: as for etchings they are of two kinds british and foreign

text: HE LAMENTS MOST BITTERLY THE DIVORCE THAT HAS BEEN MADE BETWEEN DECORATIVE ART AND WHAT WE USUALLY CALL PICTURES MAKES THE CUSTOMARY APPEAL TO THE LAST JUDGMENT AND REMINDS US THAT IN THE GREAT DAYS OF ART MICHAEL ANGELO WAS THE FURNISHING UPHOLSTERER
reference: he laments most bitterly the divorce that has been made between decorative art and what we usually call pictures makes the customary appeal to the last judgment and reminds us that in the great days of art michael angelo was the furnishing upholsterer

text: NEAR THE FIRE AND THE ORNAMENTS FRED BROUGHT HOME FROM INDIA ON THE MANTEL BOARD
reference: near the fire and the ornaments fred brought home from india on the mantel board

text: IN FACT HE IS QUITE SEVERE ON MISTER RUSKIN FOR NOT RECOGNISING THAT A PICTURE SHOULD DENOTE THE FRAILTY OF MAN AND REMARKS WITH PLEASING COURTESY AND FELICITOUS GRACE THAT MANY PHASES OF FEELING
reference: in fact he is quite severe on mister ruskin for not recognising that a picture should denote the frailty of man and remarks with pleasing courtesy and felicitous grace that many phases of feeling

text: ONLY UNFORTUNATELY HIS OWN WORK NEVER DOES GET GOOD
reference: only unfortunately his own work never does get good

text: MISTER QUILTER HAS MISSED HIS CHANCE FOR HE HAS FAILED EVEN TO MAKE HIMSELF THE TUPPER OF PAINTING
reference: mister quilter has missed his chance for he has failed even to make himself the tupper of painting

text: BY HARRY QUILTER M A
reference: by harry quilter m a

text: BECAUSE YOU WERE SLEEPING INSTEAD OF CONQUERING THE LOVELY ROSE PRINCESS HAS BECOME A FIDDLE WITHOUT A BOW WHILE POOR SHAGGY SITS THERE A COOING DOVE
reference: because you were sleeping instead of conquering the lovely rose princess has become a fiddle without a bow while poor shaggy sits there a cooing dove

text: HE HAS GONE AND GONE FOR GOOD ANSWERED POLYCHROME WHO HAD MANAGED TO SQUEEZE INTO THE ROOM BESIDE THE DRAGON AND HAD WITNESSED THE OCCURRENCES WITH MUCH INTEREST
reference: he has gone and gone for good answered polychrome who had managed to squeeze into the room beside the dragon and had witnessed the occurrences with much interest

text: I HAVE REMAINED A PRISONER ONLY BECAUSE I WISHED TO BE ONE AND WITH THIS HE STEPPED FORWARD AND BURST THE STOUT CHAINS AS EASILY AS IF THEY HAD BEEN THREADS
reference: i have remained a prisoner only because i wished to be one and with this he stepped forward and burst the stout chains as easily as if they had been threads

text: THE LITTLE GIRL HAD BEEN ASLEEP BUT SHE HEARD THE RAPS AND OPENED THE DOOR
reference: the little girl had been asleep but she heard the raps and opened the door

text: THE KING HAS FLED IN DISGRACE AND YOUR FRIENDS ARE ASKING FOR YOU
reference: the king has fled in disgrace and your friends are asking for you

text: I BEGGED RUGGEDO LONG AGO TO SEND HIM AWAY BUT HE WOULD NOT DO SO
reference: i begged ruggedo long ago to send him away but he would not do so

text: I ALSO OFFERED TO HELP YOUR BROTHER TO ESCAPE BUT HE WOULD NOT GO
reference: i also offered to help your brother to escape but he would not go

text: HE EATS AND SLEEPS VERY STEADILY REPLIED THE NEW KING
reference: he eats and sleeps very steadily replied the new king

text: I HOPE HE DOESN'T WORK TOO HARD SAID SHAGGY
reference: i hope he doesn't work too hard said shaggy

text: HE DOESN'T WORK AT ALL
reference: he doesn't work at all

text: IN FACT THERE IS NOTHING HE CAN DO IN THESE DOMINIONS AS WELL AS OUR NOMES WHOSE NUMBERS ARE SO GREAT THAT IT WORRIES US TO KEEP THEM ALL BUSY
reference: in fact there is nothing he can do in these dominions as well as our nomes whose numbers are so great that it worries us to keep them all busy

text: NOT EXACTLY RETURNED KALIKO
reference: not exactly returned kaliko

text: WHERE IS MY BROTHER NOW
reference: where is my brother now

text: INQUIRED SHAGGY IN THE METAL FOREST
reference: inquired shaggy in the metal forest

text: WHERE IS THAT
reference: where is that

text: THE METAL FOREST IS IN THE GREAT DOMED CAVERN THE LARGEST IN ALL OUR DOMINIONS REPLIED KALIKO
reference: the metal forest is in the great domed cavern the largest in all our dominions replied kaliko

text: KALIKO HESITATED
reference: kaliko hesitated

text: HOWEVER IF WE LOOK SHARP WE MAY BE ABLE TO DISCOVER ONE OF THESE SECRET WAYS
reference: however if we look sharp we may be able to discover one of these secret ways

text: OH NO I'M QUITE SURE HE DIDN'T
reference: oh no i'm quite sure he didn't

text: THAT'S FUNNY REMARKED BETSY THOUGHTFULLY
reference: that's funny remarked betsy thoughtfully

text: I DON'T BELIEVE ANN KNEW ANY MAGIC OR SHE'D HAVE WORKED IT BEFORE
reference: i don't believe ann knew any magic or she'd have worked it before

text: I DO NOT KNOW CONFESSED SHAGGY
reference: i do not know confessed shaggy

text: TRUE AGREED KALIKO
reference: true agreed kaliko

text: KALIKO WENT TO THE BIG GONG AND POUNDED ON IT JUST AS RUGGEDO USED TO DO BUT NO ONE ANSWERED THE SUMMONS
reference: kaliko went to the big gong and pounded on it just as ruggedo used to do but no one answered the summons

text: HAVING RETURNED TO THE ROYAL CAVERN KALIKO FIRST POUNDED THE GONG AND THEN SAT IN THE THRONE WEARING RUGGEDO'S DISCARDED RUBY CROWN AND HOLDING IN HIS HAND THE SCEPTRE WHICH RUGGEDO HAD SO OFTEN THROWN AT HIS HEAD
reference: having returned to the royal cavern kaliko first pounded the gong and then sat in the throne wearing ruggedo's discarded ruby crown and holding in his hand the sceptre which ruggedo had so often thrown at his head

text: A MAN SAID TO THE UNIVERSE SIR I EXIST
reference: a man said to the universe sir i exist

text: SWEAT COVERED BRION'S BODY TRICKLING INTO THE TIGHT LOINCLOTH THAT WAS THE ONLY GARMENT HE WORE
reference: sweat covered brion's body trickling into the tight loincloth that was the only garment he wore

text: THE CUT ON HIS CHEST STILL DRIPPING BLOOD THE ACHE OF HIS OVERSTRAINED EYES EVEN THE SOARING ARENA AROUND HIM WITH THE THOUSANDS OF SPECTATORS WERE TRIVIALITIES NOT WORTH THINKING ABOUT
reference: the cut on his chest still dripping blood the ache of his overstrained eyes even the soaring arena around him with the thousands of spectators were trivialities not worth thinking about

text: HIS INSTANT OF PANIC WAS FOLLOWED BY A SMALL SHARP BLOW HIGH ON HIS CHEST
reference: his instant of panic was followed by a small sharp blow high on his chest

text: ONE MINUTE A VOICE SAID AND THE TIME BUZZER SOUNDED
reference: one minute a voice said and the time buzzer sounded

text: A MINUTE IS NOT A VERY LARGE MEASURE OF TIME AND HIS BODY NEEDED EVERY FRACTION OF IT
reference: a minute is not a very large measure of time and his body needed every fraction of it

text: THE BUZZER'S WHIRR TRIGGERED HIS MUSCLES INTO COMPLETE RELAXATION
reference: the buzzer's whirr triggered his muscles into complete relaxation

text: ONLY HIS HEART AND LUNGS WORKED ON AT A STRONG MEASURED RATE
reference: only his heart and lungs worked on at a strong measured rate

text: HE WAS IN REVERIE SLIDING ALONG THE BORDERS OF CONSCIOUSNESS
reference: he was in reverie sliding along the borders of consciousness

text: THE CONTESTANTS IN THE TWENTIES NEEDED UNDISTURBED REST THEREFORE NIGHTS IN THE DORMITORIES WERE AS QUIET AS DEATH
reference: the contestants in the twenties needed undisturbed rest therefore nights in the dormitories were as quiet as death

text: PARTICULARLY SO ON THIS LAST NIGHT WHEN ONLY TWO OF THE LITTLE CUBICLES WERE OCCUPIED THE THOUSANDS OF OTHERS STANDING WITH DARK EMPTY DOORS
reference: particularly so on this last night when only two of the little cubicles were occupied the thousands of others standing with dark empty doors

text: THE OTHER VOICE SNAPPED WITH A HARSH URGENCY CLEARLY USED TO COMMAND
reference: the other voice snapped with a harsh urgency clearly used to command

text: I'M HERE BECAUSE THE MATTER IS OF UTMOST IMPORTANCE AND BRANDD IS THE ONE I MUST SEE NOW STAND ASIDE
reference: i'm here because the matter is of utmost importance and brandd is the one i must see now stand aside

text: THE TWENTIES
reference: the twenties

text: HE MUST HAVE DRAWN HIS GUN BECAUSE THE INTRUDER SAID QUICKLY PUT THAT AWAY YOU'RE BEING A FOOL OUT
reference: he must have drawn his gun because the intruder said quickly put that away you're being a fool out

text: THERE WAS SILENCE THEN AND STILL WONDERING BRION WAS ONCE MORE ASLEEP
reference: there was silence then and still wondering brion was once more asleep

text: TEN SECONDS
reference: ten seconds

text: HE ASKED THE HANDLER WHO WAS KNEADING HIS ACHING MUSCLES
reference: he asked the handler who was kneading his aching muscles

text: A RED HAIRED MOUNTAIN OF A MAN WITH AN APPARENTLY INEXHAUSTIBLE STORE OF ENERGY
reference: a red haired mountain of a man with an apparently inexhaustible store of energy

text: THERE COULD BE LITTLE ART IN THIS LAST AND FINAL ROUND OF FENCING
reference: there could be little art in this last and final round of fencing

text: JUST THRUST AND PARRY AND VICTORY TO THE STRONGER
reference: just thrust and parry and victory to the stronger

text: EVERY MAN WHO ENTERED THE TWENTIES HAD HIS OWN TRAINING TRICKS
reference: every man who entered the twenties had his own training tricks

text: THERE APPEARED TO BE AN IMMEDIATE ASSOCIATION WITH THE DEATH TRAUMA AS IF THE TWO WERE INEXTRICABLY LINKED INTO ONE
reference: there appeared to be an immediate association with the death trauma as if the two were inextricably linked into one

text: THE STRENGTH THAT ENABLES SOMEONE IN A TRANCE TO HOLD HIS BODY STIFF AND UNSUPPORTED EXCEPT AT TWO POINTS THE HEAD AND HEELS
reference: the strength that enables someone in a trance to hold his body stiff and unsupported except at two points the head and heels

text: THIS IS PHYSICALLY IMPOSSIBLE WHEN CONSCIOUS
reference: this is physically impossible when conscious

text: OTHERS HAD DIED BEFORE DURING THE TWENTIES AND DEATH DURING THE LAST ROUND WAS IN SOME WAYS EASIER THAN DEFEAT
reference: others had died before during the twenties and death during the last round was in some ways easier than defeat

text: BREATHING DEEPLY BRION SOFTLY SPOKE THE AUTO HYPNOTIC PHRASES THAT TRIGGERED THE PROCESS
reference: breathing deeply brion softly spoke the auto hypnotic phrases that triggered the process

text: WHEN THE BUZZER SOUNDED HE PULLED HIS FOIL FROM HIS SECOND'S STARTLED GRASP AND RAN FORWARD
reference: when the buzzer sounded he pulled his foil from his second's startled grasp and ran forward

text: IROLG LOOKED AMAZED AT THE SUDDEN FURY OF THE ATTACK THEN SMILED
reference: irolg looked amazed at the sudden fury of the attack then smiled

text: HE THOUGHT IT WAS A LAST BURST OF ENERGY HE KNEW HOW CLOSE THEY BOTH WERE TO EXHAUSTION
reference: he thought it was a last burst of energy he knew how close they both were to exhaustion

text: BRION SAW SOMETHING CLOSE TO PANIC ON HIS OPPONENT'S FACE WHEN THE MAN FINALLY RECOGNIZED HIS ERROR
reference: brion saw something close to panic on his opponent's face when the man finally recognized his error

text: A WAVE OF DESPAIR ROLLED OUT FROM IROLG BRION SENSED IT AND KNEW THE FIFTH POINT WAS HIS
reference: a wave of despair rolled out from irolg brion sensed it and knew the fifth point was his

text: THEN THE POWERFUL TWIST THAT THRUST IT ASIDE IN AND UNDER THE GUARD
reference: then the powerful twist that thrust it aside in and under the guard
